data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_COLORSPREAD_SETTINGS_DESC
data.value: Erzeugt einen Punkt auf dem Bildschirm und breitet ihn über die gesamte Konsole aus (Kreisradius).

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_EVAPORATE_SETTINGS_DESC
data.value: Simuliert verdunstende Wassertropfen.

data.value: Zeichnet englische Buchstaben mit Figlet.

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_LINESABER_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_LINEUP_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_MARKSCREEN_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_PRIMUS_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_RAINING_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_RIPPLE_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_SWIVELREVEAL_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_TEXTREVEAL_SETTINGS_DESC

data.name: NKS_SCREENSAVERPACKS_WAVERUN_SETTINGS_DESC
